meanings.definition: In a way that shows or expresses despair or hopelessness.
meanings.sent1: She looked despondently at the rainy sky.
meanings.sent2: He sighed despondently as he realized he had missed the last bus.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed despondently when it saw its empty food bowl.
meanings.sent4: The flowers drooped despondently after days without water.
meanings.sent5: The old man sat despondently on the park bench, lost in his thoughts.

meanings.definition: Feeling or showing extreme discouragement or depression.
meanings.sent1: Her despondently expression worried her friends.
meanings.sent2: The despondently student struggled to focus in class.
meanings.sent3: The despondently puppy refused to play with its toys.
meanings.sent4: The despondently clouds matched his gloomy mood.
meanings.sent5: The despondently atmosphere in the room was palpable.
